ygData.subject: Re: Kelin's Lullaby
ygData.msgSnippet: Well, it used to make them forget about you. Now it seems to nix the S list of the creatures and add you to it. This also means that you ll tick off anything
ygData.messageBody:
Well, it used to make them forget about you. Now it seems to nix the 'S'
list of the creatures and add you to it. This also means that you'll tick
off anything that steps in range regardless of if they were mad at you or
not before. Best use is to continuously play it or stack it when you have a
large group or if your friendly mage type just unloaded on something.

Good Journey,

Sineras (Cazic-Thule)


-----Original Message-----
From: Basil Eckert [mailto:athelas@...]
Sent: Monday, April 26, 1999 7:46 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: [eqbards] Kelin's Lullaby


From: Basil Eckert <athelas@...>

Yesterday I got the song Kelin's Lucyd Lullaby in Kelethin. I've heard
several times that this is one of the most powerful bard songs and I was
really
looking forward to get it. But now i have to admit that i am quite
disapponited. I thought that it should stop monsters attacking you, and this
seems to
be true, but after a few seconds they start attacking you again. I've read
in this newsgroup that the song makes monsters forget you so they wont
attack you any more when you go away, but that doesnt seem to be true. In
fact
EVERY monster in a certain area around you will attack after a while when
you
are singing the song. So if you are in real trouble and want to get rid of
that nasty monster attacking you, you just start singing that song and 10
seconds later EVRY living being near you will start attacking you. I really
dont know why this song is called to be one of the most powerful ones...
If i am wrong please tell me, I would really appreciate.

Athelas
Tarew Marr
